title: Customizing Matplotlib Visualizations
description: This lab will guide you through the process of customizing Matplotlib using style sheets and rcParams. Matplotlib is a powerful library for creating visualizations in Python. By customizing the properties and default styles of Matplotlib, you can create unique and visually appealing plots.
